name: Attack with
blurb: Make an attack, targeting one being.
description: You may use one action to make an attack against a being you can see. On a successful hit, the creature takes the damage specified by the weapon.

name: Remove Stress
description: You have a pool of destress points equal to your skill modifier that you may spend to remove stress. The targeted being must be able to see and hear you. You may remove stress from multiple beings so long as you have the destress points to do so.

name: Double Turn
blurb: Grant beings an additional turn this round.
description: You may target up to 3 beings to grant them an additional turn this round. The beings must be able to hear you.

name: Triple Attack
blurb: You may make three consecutive attacks against a target.
description: You may attack a target three times. Each attack is treated as it's own Attack Action and an Accuracy Roll must be made for each.

name: Triple Attack
blurb: You may make three consecutive attacks against a target. If all three hit, the target dies instantly.
description: You may attack a target three times. Each attack is treated as it's own Attack Action and an Accuracy Roll must be made for each. If all three attacks hit, the target dies regardless of it's remaining HP.
